uvi.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.4.128
uvi.description:
net: ethernet: fix potential use-after-free in ec_bhf_remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.128 by commit 19f88ca68ccf8771276a606765239b167654f84a, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 6af55ff52b02d492d45db88df3e461fa51a6f753. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: ethernet: fix potential use-after-free in ec_bhf_remove
